Register Based Settings:Window Access

Short name: Win Access

Requires: Base Development System

Classes: FireWire Instr, PXI Instr, PXI MemAcc, VXI/GPIB-VXI/VME RBD Instr, Instr, VXI/GPIB-VXI MBD Instr, VXI/GPIB-VXI/VME MemAcc

Returns whether the current session has a mapped window, and if so, whether the window allows direct pointer dereferences.

Values

1 Not Mapped
2 Use Peek/Poke Operations
3 Can Dereference Pointer
4 Pointer value is byte-swapped

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this property.

Data type
Permissions Read Only
